'Pyrazine' is a heterocyclic aromatic organic compound with the chemical formula
C 4H 4N 2.

Pyrazine is a symmetrical molecule with point group D 2h . Derivatives
such as phenazine are well known for their antitumor, antibiotic and diuretic
activities. Pyrazine is less basic in nature than pyridine, pyridazine and
pyrimidine. Tetramethylpyrazine (also known as ligustrazine) is reported to
scavenge superoxide anion and decrease nitric oxide production in human
polymorphonuclear leukocytes, Life Sciences, '2003', 72, 2465-2472, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/S0024-3205(03)00139-
5 and is a component of some herbs in traditional Chinese
medicine. http://www.itmonline.org/arts/ligustrazine.htm
